FullText:
Jaculi

This creature appears as serpent with a long muscular body and a squat, flat head. A mane-like ridge of sharpened bones surrounds its head.



Jaculi

CR 1/2

XP 200
N Medium magical beast
Init +3; Senses darkvision 60 ft., low-light vision, scent; Perception +4
DEFENSE
AC 15, touch 13, flat-footed 12 (+3 Dex, +2 natural)
hp 5 (1d10)
Fort +2, Ref +5, Will +1
OFFENSE
Spd 30 ft.
Melee bite +4 (1d6+1)
Space 5 ft.; Reach 5 ft.
Special Attacks ambush leap
STATISTICS
Str 12, Dex 17, Con 11, Int 2, Wis 12, Cha 2
Base Atk +1; CMB +2; CMD 15 (can't be tripped)
Feats Skill Focus (Perception)B, Weapon Finesse
Skills Perception +4, Stealth +7 (+19 in natural environment); Racial Modifiers +12 Stealth in natural environment
ECOLOGY
Environment temperate forests
Organization gang (2-5) or swarm (6-13)
Treasure none
SPECIAL ABILITIES
Ambush Leap (Ex) A jaculi is not required to make an Acrobatics check when jumping down from heights of 30 feet or less and can do so without taking any damage.


Jaculi average 8 feet long, but can grow to a length of 12 feet. Its natural coloration is a deep green fading to dark brown near the tail. Its underbelly is light gray. Jaculi usually lie in wait for opponents, preferring places high above the ground where they can leap on their prey and gain surprise.

Credit The Jaculi originally appeared in the First Edition Fiend Folio (© TSR/ Wizards of the Coast, 1981) and is used by permission.
